alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; Koochiching; North St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 20 at 11:24AM CDT until April 20 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Wet snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 3 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Central St. Louis, Northern Cook and Lake, Koochiching, North St. Louis and Southern Lake Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Bois Forte Band, Lake Vermilion and, Nett Lake areas. * WHEN...Until 7 PM CDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; Koochiching; North St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Lake, North Shore
